meanings: (정신이 이상해지다) go crazy[mad, insane], be[go] out of one's mind
(상식에서 벗어나다) be crazy, be[go] out of one's mind

vlive.korean: 미친~ You are crazy. 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 요즘 너만 보면 자꾸 커진단 말이야 [리얼:타임:러브2] EP3
야 이 미친놈아 뭐? What? You are crazy! 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 그날 밤 일 죽어도 얘기 안하려고...[넘버식스]ep7.
너희들 진짜 미친 거 아니야? Are you guys crazy? 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 그날 밤 일 죽어도 얘기 안하려고...[넘버식스]ep7.
미친 건 너야 돌부처야! You are the one who is crazy! 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 그날 밤 일 죽어도 얘기 안하려고...[넘버식스]ep7.
vlive.english: You are the one who is crazy!

vlive.korean: 진짜 미친 버전 보여줘? You want to see the crazy me? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 여자 둘이 손잡고 X레기 족치는 법[엑스엑스(XX)] - EP.08
vlive.english: You want to see the crazy me?

examples.korean: They made frantic attempts to revive him. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 그를 소생시키려고 미친 듯이 매달렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They made frantic attempts to revive him. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She was rushing around madly trying to put out the fire. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 불을 끄려고 미친 듯이 이리저리 뛰어 다녔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was rushing around madly trying to put out the fire. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The sea was wild. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 바다가 미친 듯이 요동을 쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The sea was wild. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They’re madly in love. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 미친 듯이 사랑하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They’re madly in love. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She flew into a howling rage. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 갑자기 미친 듯이 화를 냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She flew into a howling rage. Add to Wordbook
